          <title>
            <string language="en">Safety features of cars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sicherheit Merkmale der Autos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dispositifs de sûreté des voitures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Características de segurança dos carros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche di sicurezza degli automobili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηριστικά γνωρίσματα ασφάλειας των αυτοκινήτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características de seguridad de coches</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows car features that help protect the driver and passengers during accidents.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Accidents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crumple zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">passenger cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Safety</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Automerkmalen, daß Hilfe 
den Treiber und die Passagiere während der Unfälle schützen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve à des dispositifs de 
voiture que l'aide protègent le gestionnaire et les passagers pendant
les accidents.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a características do 
carro que a ajuda protege o excitador e os passageiros durante 
acidentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica a caratteristiche 
dell'automobile che l'aiuto protegge il driver ed i passeggeri durante
gli incidenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει χαρακτηριστικά γνωρίσματα
αυτοκινήτων ότι οι οδηγίες προστατεύουν τον οδηγό και τους 
επιβάτες κατά τη διάρκεια των ατυχημάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a características del 
coche que la ayuda protege al programa piloto y a pasajeros durante 
accidentes.</string>
          </description>
